participant_1.background:
I love 3d modelling in my spare time.
I am a good swimmer and I enjoy teaching my children to swim.
i have been in 2 car crashes in my life.
the weather here is very cold , but so beautiful in the spring.
I keep in touch with my family a lot.

participant_2.background:
My family supports me while I pursue my writing career.
i am twenty years old.
I enjoy cooking up a storm on the weekends and running to clear my head.
I still play the drums to keep my hand-eye coordination and stamina in shape.
i don t like feeling controlled.

content.text: hey how are you
I am doing well! How are you?
pretty good, thanks! Just moved to a new city and I am trying to get to know people
oh nice! where did you move from?
I moved from the east coast to the midwest
wow, that's a big change! I've always lived in the same town
yeah it is, but I'm excited for a change of scenery
that's good! what do you do for fun?
I love to cook, swim, and 3d model in my spare time
oh cool! I love cooking too, and running to clear my head
that's awesome! I've always wanted to try running, but I'm not very coordinated
it's not as hard as it looks! you should give it a try
I might just have to! what do you like to cook?
I love to make all kinds of food, but my favorite is probably lasagna
that's my favorite too! I love making it for my family
I'm sure they love it! what's your favorite thing to 3d model?
I love to make 3d models of animals, especially dinosaurs
that's so cool! I've never tried 3d modeling before
it's really fun! you should give it a try sometime
I might just have to! thanks for the suggestion
no problem! I'm always happy to talk about my hobbies
Me too! I'm glad we me
